mention.text: el pital , cifuentes , el paraiso department
troops set up communications tracking equipment in loma fria , which was protected by missiles and antiaircraft machineguns
mejia rodriguez and her son guillermo
saul mejia herrera , who had been kidnapped by eps troops on 21 august 1988
saul mejia herrera , who were taken to nicaraguan territory
positions held by the 9th infantry battalion at la congolona on the poteca river with 82 - and 120-mm mortars , rpg-7 's , and rifle fire
rpg-7 's , positions held by the 6th infantry battalion in el pital , and also in aduena vieja , guasapo , and cifuentes
